about_the_game:
It's a very very short game using lattice boltzmann method.

Game Control

Use the mouse to drag and move the oil droplets, aiming to gather the floating oil into a cluster.
You can leisurely collect the floating oil or challenge yourself to see how fast you can gather them.
That's it.

Background story

After finishing the ramen, you suddenly feel inspired to gather the oil floating on the surface of the soup.
As you lightly touch the water with your chopsticks, tiny ripples form, causing the oil droplets to merge with each other.
This process brings you a sense of relaxation and contentment.

Also, I would really appreciate it if you could include a link to the Steam store page in the video summary section of your distribution.

name: Ramen Oil Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Use the mouse to drag and move the oil droplets, aiming to gather the floating oil into a cluster.
